expiration.question: Do credits expire?
expiration.answer: No, your Mythoria credits never expire! You can use them whenever inspiration strikes.

refund.question: Can I get a refund on unused credits?
refund.answer: Currently, credits are non-refundable. However, they can be used for any of our services or gifted to another user in the future.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We plan to accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express) and PayPal. (Payment integration coming soon)

shipping.question: How are printed books shipped?
shipping.answer: Printed books are shipped via standard postal services. Shipping times and costs may vary depending on your location. You'll see detailed shipping information at checkout when ordering a printed book.
